backend/main.mo: Placeholder backend actor with no functional logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend game files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to publish the Snake PWA to the Google Play Store using TWA and Bubblewrap.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Android asset links file allowing TWA to verify the app's domain.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, theme, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, fetch interception, and cache versioning for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that renders SnakeScreen and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Defines animation timing constants and a helper to wait for a given duration.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps static asset paths and includes a helper to compute sprite positions for candy types.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a simple audio manager for loading and playing sounds, initialized with silent placeholder audio.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Exports helper functions to play specific game sound effects using the audio manager.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial boards without matches, creates candies, checks for matches, and refills empty cells.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles the board until a layout with legal moves is produced, up to a retry limit.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: Renders an individual candy tile with sprite selection, special candy handling, and interaction events.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the full game grid, managing touch interactions, highlighting, selection, and swap attempts.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game screen combining HUD, board, controls, overlays, and audio toggle logic.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to drop candies downward and returns the updated board plus fall information.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Provides utilities for checking adjacency, validating positions, and getting neighboring cells.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Detects whether any swap on the board would produce a match, indicating legal moves exist.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Finds horizontal and vertical matches and checks if swapping two positions would create a match.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Provides game over and level complete overlay components with icons, score display, and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Generates level configuration and checks if a level’s target score has been reached.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, applies special candy creation and activations, clears cells, applies scoring, and returns updated board state.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Calculates score values and determines target scores and starting moves for each level.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes target cells for special candy effects and detects certain special-combo interactions.
frontend/src/game/specialCandyRules.ts: Determines which special candy to create from a match and applies its creation to the board.
frontend/src/game/touchControls.ts: Detects swipe direction based on touch movement exceeding a threshold.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines core game constants and TypeScript types for candies, matches, animations, and game state.
frontend/src/game/useMatch3Game.ts: Main React hook managing match-3 game state, progression, cascades, animations, and audio effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Provides fullscreen API helpers with state tracking and cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for loading, storing, and managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no backend queries for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles and theme variables plus layout and game screen styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/snake/DPad.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a directional pad component.
frontend/src/snake/Joystick.tsx: Implements on-screen joystick with pointer tracking and filtered angle output.
frontend/src/snake/joystickSteeringFilte: Implements a joystick steering filter with deadzone, hysteresis, and angle smoothing for stable directional input.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Defines world constants and core snake-game logic including distance math, wrap-around, snake creation, and initial game state setup.
frontend/src/snake/pickupSprites.ts: Maps pickups to sprite-sheet rectangles and provides size rules for rendering different pickup types.
frontend/src/snake/RotateToLandscapeOver: Overlay prompting users to rotate to landscape mode on mobile.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeBoosters.tsx: Renders disabled booster buttons using Worms Zone asset sprites.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer that draws the snake world, handling camera logic, wrapping, DPR scaling, and rendering sprites for background, snakes, food, and pickups.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeHUD.tsx: HUD showing leaderboard, mission progress, timer, and coin count using styled UI panels.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMainMenu.tsx: Main menu screen with logo, instructions, and buttons to start the game or access customization.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMinimap.tsx: Renders a minimap showing player, AI snakes, and viewport area on a small canvas using world scaling.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMissionCompleteO: Overlay panel displayed briefly when a mission is completed.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: UI overlays for idle, pause, and game‑over states, displaying messages and action buttons.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Main game screen orchestrating game state, input handling, viewport sizing, overlays, and rendering components.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for vectors, game entities, mission state, and overall snake game state.
frontend/src/snake/useCanvasViewport.ts: React hook that measures a container and outputs DPR-aware canvas viewport dimensions with resize stabilization.
frontend/src/snake/useLandscapeOrientati: React hook detecting whether the device is in landscape orientation and updates state on orientation changes.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: Main React game loop and state manager handling movement, missions, input angles, AI updates, and timing.
frontend/src/snake/wzAssets.ts: Centralized list of asset paths for Worms Zone–style graphics and UI elements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container rules, and enabling plugins for typography and queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, and current request to increase gameplay screen size.
